## Quarto

Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see <https://quarto.org>.

## Formula in LaTeX

Ecco un'equazione ben formattata:

$$
f(x) = \int_{-\infty}^{\infty} e^{-x^2} \, dx
$$

## Codice R

Ora un semplice blocco di codice R che genera un grafico:

`r eval=T # Genera un semplice plot  x <- seq(-3, 3, 0.1)  y <- dnorm(x)  plot(x, y, type = "l", main = "Distribuzione Normale")`

## Running Code

When you click the **Render** button a document will be generated that includes both content and the output of embedded code. You can embed code like this:

```{r}
1 + 1
```

You can add options to executable code like this

```{r}
#| echo: false
2 * 2
```

The `echo: false` option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed) \citep{einstein1905}.
